mapper.select: SELECT T5913."ninteiChosainCode" , T5913."chosainShimei" , T5910."ninteichosaItakusakiCode" , T5910."jigyoshaMeisho" , T5910."yubinNo" AS "ninteiYubinNo" , T5910."jusho" AS "ninteiJusho" , T5910."telNo" AS "ninteiTelNo" , T5201."ninteichosaIraiYMD" , T5123."ninteichosaYoteiYMD" , T5202."ninteichosaJisshiYMD" , T5910."chosaItakuKubun" , T5101."homonChosasakiName" , T5101."homonChosasakiYubinNo" , T5101."homonChosasakiJusho" , T5101."homonChosasakiTelNo" , T5912."shujiiCode" , T5912."shujiiName" , T5911."shujiiIryokikanCode" , T5911."iryoKikanMeisho" , T5911."yubinNo" AS "shujiiYubinNo" , T5911."jusho" AS "shujiiJusho" , T5911."telNo" AS "shujiiTelNo" , T5301."ikenshoSakuseiIraiYMD" , T5123."ikenshoTorokuYoteiYMD" , T5302."ikenshoKinyuYMD" , T5912."shiteiiFlag" , T5116."ichijiHanteiKekkaCode" , T5116."ichijiHanteiYMD" , T5116."ichijiHanteiKekkaNinchishoKasanCode" , T5102."shinsakaiShiryoSakuseiYMD" , T5123."ninteiShinsakaiYoteiYMD" , T5102."nijiHanteiYMD" , T5102."nijiHanteiYokaigoJotaiKubunCode" , T5102."nijiHanteiNinteiYukoKikan" , T5102."nijiHanteiNinteiYukoKaishiYMD" , T5102."nijiHanteiNinteiYukoShuryoYMD" , T5101."enkiTsuchiHakkoYMD" , T5101."enkiTsuchiHakkoKaisu" , T5101."shinseishoKanriNo" , T5101."koroshoIfShikibetsuCode" , T7051."shichosonCode" FROM rgdb."DbT4001JukyushaDaicho" T4001 INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho" T5101 ON T5101."hihokenshaNo" = T4001."hihokenshaNo" AND T5101."logicalDeletedFlag" = FALSE INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT7051KoseiShichosonMaster" T7051 ON T5101."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" = T7051."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5201NinteichosaIraiJoho" AS T5201 ON T5101."shinseishoKanriNo" = T5201."shinseishoKanriNo" AND T5201."logicalDeletedFlag" = False AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 'X' FROM rgdb."DbT5201NinteichosaIraiJoho" AS B1 WHERE T5201."shinseishoKanriNo" = B1."shinseishoKanriNo" AND B1."logicalDeletedFlag" = False AND T5201."ninteichosaIraiRirekiNo" < B1."ninteichosaIraiRirekiNo" ) LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5202NinteichosahyoGaikyoChosa" AS T5202 ON T5101."shinseishoKanriNo" = T5202."shinseishoKanriNo" AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 'X' FROM rgdb."DbT5202NinteichosahyoGaikyoChosa" AS A1 WHERE T5202."shinseishoKanriNo" = A1."shinseishoKanriNo" AND T5202."ninteichosaRirekiNo" < A1."ninteichosaRirekiNo" ) LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5910NinteichosaItakusakiJoho" T5910 ON T5201."ninteichosaItakusakiCode" = T5910."ninteichosaItakusakiCode" AND T7051."shichosonCode" = T5910."shichosonCode" AND T5910."jokyoFlag" = True LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5913ChosainJoho" T5913 ON T5201."ninteichosaItakusakiCode" = T5913."ninteiChosaItakusakiCode" AND T5201."ninteiChosainCode" = T5913."ninteiChosainCode" AND T7051."shichosonCode" = T5913."shichosonCode" AND T5913."jokyoFlag" = True LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5301ShujiiIkenshoIraiJoho" AS T5301 ON T5101."shinseishoKanriNo" = T5301."shinseishoKanriNo" AND T5301."logicalDeletedFlag" = False AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 'X' FROM rgdb."DbT5301ShujiiIkenshoIraiJoho" AS B2 WHERE T5301."shinseishoKanriNo" = B2."shinseishoKanriNo" AND B2."logicalDeletedFlag" = False AND T5301."ikenshoIraiRirekiNo" < B2."ikenshoIraiRirekiNo" ) LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5302ShujiiIkenshoJoho" AS T5302 ON T5101."shinseishoKanriNo" = T5302."shinseishoKanriNo" AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 'X' FROM rgdb."DbT5302ShujiiIkenshoJoho" AS A2 WHERE T5302."shinseishoKanriNo" = A2."shinseishoKanriNo" AND T5302."ikenshoIraiRirekiNo" < A2."ikenshoIraiRirekiNo" ) LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5911ShujiiIryoKikanJoho" T5911 ON T5301."shujiiIryokikanCode" = T5911."shujiiIryokikanCode" AND T7051."shichosonCode" = T5911."shichosonCode" AND T5911."jokyoFlag" = True LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5912ShujiiJoho" T5912 ON T5301."shujiiIryokikanCode" = T5912."shujiiIryokikanCode" AND T5301."shujiiCode" = T5912."shujiiCode" AND T7051."shichosonCode" = T5912."shichosonCode" AND T5912."jokyoFlag" = True LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5123NinteiKeikakuJoho" T5123 ON T5101."shinseishoKanriNo" = T5123."shinseishoKanriNo" LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5116IchijiHanteiKekkaJoho" T5116 ON T5101."shinseishoKanriNo" = T5116."shinseishoKanriNo" LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5102NinteiKekkaJoho" T5102 ON T5101."shinseishoKanriNo" = T5102."shinseishoKanriNo" WHERE T4001."hihokenshaNo" = #{被保険者番号} AND T4001."logicalDeletedFlag" = FALSE ORDER BY T4001."ninteiYMD" DESC LIMIT 2

mapper.select: SELECT T5101."shinseishoKanriNo" , T4001."jukyuShinseiJiyu" , T5101."shienShinseiKubun" , T4001."shinseiJokyoKubun" , T5101."ninteiShinseiYMD" , T5101."ninteiShinseiHoreiKubunCode" , T5101."ninteiShinseiShinseijiKubunCode" , T4001."shishoCode" , T4001."kyuSochishaFlag" , T5101."hihokenshaKubunCode" , T4001."shikakuShutokuMaeShinseiFlag" , T5101."nigoTokuteiShippeiCode" , T5101."ninteiShinseiRiyu" , T5101."shinseiServiceDeleteRiyu" , T5912."shujiiCode" , T5912."shujiiName" , T5911."shujiiIryokikanCode" , T5911."iryoKikanMeisho" , T5101."shiteiiFlag" , T5910."ninteichosaItakusakiCode" , T5910."jigyoshaMeisho" , T5913."ninteiChosainCode" , T5913."chosainShimei" , T5101."kateiHomonFlag" , T5101."homonChosasakiName" , T5101."homonChosasakiYubinNo" , T5101."homonChosasakiJusho" , T5101."homonChosasakiTelNo" , T5101."zenYokaigoKubunCode" , T5101."zenkaiNinteiYMD" , T5101."zenkaiYukoKikanStart" , T5101."zenkaiYukoKikanEnd" , T4001."dataKubun" , T4001."sakujoJiyuCode" , T4001."idoRiyu" , T4001."soshitsuYMD" , T5101."torisageYMD" , T4001."toshoNinteiYukoKaishiYMD" , T4001."toshoNinteiYukoShuryoYMD" , T4001."jukyuShikakuShomeishoHakkoYMD1" , T4001."jukyuShikakuShomeishoHakkoYMD2" , V1004."daichoShubetsu" , V1004."nyushoShisetsuShurui" , V1004."nyushoShisetsuCode" , T4001."yokaigoJotaiKubunCode" , T4001."ninteiYukoKikanKaishiYMD" , T4001."ninteiYukoKikanShuryoYMD" , T4001."ninteiYMD" , T5102."shinsakaiIken" , T5101."renrakuJikoToChosain" , T5101."renrakuJikoToShujii" , T5101."shichosonRenrakuJiko" , T5101."shikibetsuCode" , T7051."shichosonCode" FROM rgdb."DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho" T5101 INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT4001JukyushaDaicho" T4001 ON T4001."shinseishoKanriNo" = T5101."shinseishoKanriNo" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT7051KoseiShichosonMaster" T7051 ON T7051."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" = T5101."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5910NinteichosaItakusakiJoho" T5910 ON T5910."shichosonCode" = T7051."shichosonCode" AND T5910."ninteichosaItakusakiCode" = T5101."ninteiChosaItakusakiCode" AND T5910."jokyoFlag" = true LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5913ChosainJoho" T5913 ON T5913."shichosonCode" = T7051."shichosonCode" AND T5913."ninteiChosaItakusakiCode" = T5101."ninteiChosaItakusakiCode" AND T5913."ninteiChosainCode" = T5101."ninteiChosainCode" AND T5913."jokyoFlag" = true LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5912ShujiiJoho" T5912 ON T5912."shichosonCode" = T7051."shichosonCode" AND T5912."shujiiIryokikanCode" = T5101."shujiiIryokikanCode" AND T5912."shujiiCode" = T5101."shujiiCode" AND T5912."jokyoFlag" = true LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5911ShujiiIryoKikanJoho" T5911 ON T5911."shichosonCode" = T7051."shichosonCode" AND T5911."shujiiIryokikanCode" = T5101."shujiiIryokikanCode" AND T5911."jokyoFlag" = true LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbV1004ShisetsuNyutaisho" V1004 ON V1004."shikibetsuCode" = T4001."shikibetsuCode" LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5102NinteiKekkaJoho" T5102 ON T5102."shinseishoKanriNo" = T5101."shinseishoKanriNo" WHERE T5101."shinseishoKanriNo" = #{申請書管理番号}
